fastformat/internal/initialiser.hpp File Reference

Detailed Description

[C, C++] INTERNAL FILE: Do not include directly.

Provides automatic initialisation of FastFormat library.

This file declares an instance of the fastformat::fastformat_initialiser class in each compilation unit in which it is included.

#include <stdio.h>
